I came across this piece on a CD in the local library (where I usually go to ?pick up? other pieces!). It?s an interesting mini-dissertation on Zip Guns. Not really on how to make ?em but on the issue of Safety. Photos are not all that? They may have been taken with a cheap ?phone camera. You can bet he won?t be nominated for a Pulitzer, but they certainly serve the purpose intended. You don?t require a password for ?read-only? access, but only just to edit it (for a G-rating?). It reads as though the author intends this to be a Public Service-type offering, perhaps even as an ?In-Service Safety Training? material for Law Enforcement?s ?thankless? presence on the streets! But ?Lord Only Knows? just how long he?s been sitting on it nurturing a jock itch! Anyway, here it is now available for public reading!  CUL8R!
